title: LDF Hosts North Charleston Town Hall Meeting on Policing (NAACP Legal Defense and Education Fund ...
text: ( Source : NAACP Legal Defense and Education Fund Inc) ( North Charleston, SC ) - Six months ago, Walter Scott , an unarmed African-American man, was killed by North Charleston police officer Michael Slager during a routine traffic stop. Next
